# DDDevice.Category

**Enumeration**

An option that determines the icon for the device in the picker UI.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Category
```

## Overview

The device ([doc://com.apple.devicediscoveryextension/documentation/DeviceDiscoveryExtension/DDDevice]) [doc://com.apple.devicediscoveryextension/documentation/DeviceDiscoveryExtension/DDDevice/category-swift.property] property is of this type.

Each value in this enumeration determines a different icon that the picker UI ([doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVKit/AVRoutePickerView]) displays, which helps the user visually confirm that their selection corresponds to the device they intend to stream media to.

## Choosing an icon for the device picker

- **DDDevice.Category.desktopComputer**: An icon that depicts a desktop computer.
- **DDDevice.Category.hifiSpeaker**: An icon that depicts a high-fidelity speaker.
- **DDDevice.Category.hifiSpeakerMultiple**: An icon that depicts multiple high-fidelity speakers.
- **DDDevice.Category.laptopComputer**: An icon that depicts a laptop computer.
- **DDDevice.Category.tv**: An icon that depicts a television.
- **DDDevice.Category.tvWithMediaBox**: An icon that depicts a TV with a set-top box.

## Enumeration Cases

- **DDDevice.Category.accessorySetup**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Device information

- **DDDevice**: An object that describes a discovered device of interest.
- **DDDeviceState**: A state that represents the level of user interaction with the device.
- **DDDeviceCategoryToString(_:)**: Returns human-readable text for the specified identifier that describes a device’s category.
- **DDDeviceStateToString(_:)**: Returns human-readable text for the specified identifier that describes a device’s status.
- **DDDevice.Protocol**: An identifier for the manner in which an app interacts with a device.
- **DDDeviceProtocolToString(_:)**: Returns human-readable text for the specified protocol identifier.
- **DDDeviceProtocolString**: String values for the manner in which an app interacts with a device.
- **DDDeviceMediaPlaybackStateToString(_:)**: Returns human-readable text for the specified media playback state.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
